liability_cap: No specific monetary liability cap stated in the provided excerpts; the agreement includes exclusions of indirect/consequential damages (clause 10.3).
risk_explanation: The agreement contains broad indemnity obligations and extensive IP/technology licensing provisions, which can create meaningful exposure for a small vendor. The limitation of liability language shown focuses on excluding indirect/consequential damages but does not clearly state a monetary cap, increasing uncertainty.
